description: Resamples Feat statistics onto the surface of the subject and onto a stereo-taxic surface atlas.

feat_dirs.title: Feat directories
feat_dirs.description: Directory where Feat results are stored. Can specify multiple directories.

feat_dirfile.title: Feat directory file
feat_dirfile.description: File with a list of Feat directories.

proj_frac.title: Projection fraction
proj_frac.description: Sample functional a fraction of the cortical thickness normal to the surface. Default is 0.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: Run on specified hemisphere (lh or rh) only. Default is both hemispheres.

target.title: Target subject
target.description: Subject used to define common surface space. Default is fsaverage.

surf.title: Surface
surf.description: Surface to resample to. Default is white.

cope_only.title: Cope only flag
cope_only.description: Only map the copes and varcopes to the common surface space

nolog_flag.title: No log flag
nolog_flag.description: Do not create a log file

out_dir.title: Output directory
out_dir.description: Output directory to use instead of default feat/reg_surf-?h/stats.
